title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 28 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 28 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Surely there is a vein for the silver, and a place for gold where they fine it.
lineList.cn: 银子有矿，炼金有方。

lineList.en: Iron is taken out of the earth, and brass is molten out of the stone.
lineList.cn: 铁从地里挖出，铜从石中熔化。

lineList.en: He setteth an end to darkness, and searcheth out all perfection: the stones of darkness, and the shadow of death.
lineList.cn: 人为黑暗定界限，查究幽暗阴翳的石头，直到极处。

lineList.en: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant; even the waters forgotten of the foot: they are dried up, they are gone away from men.
lineList.cn: 在无人居住之处刨开矿穴，过路的人也想不到他们。又与人远离，悬在空中摇来摇去。

lineList.en: As for the earth, out of it cometh bread: and under it is turned up as it were fire.
lineList.cn: 至于地，能出粮食，地内好像被火翻起来。

lineList.en: The stones of it are the place of sapphires: and it hath dust of gold.
lineList.cn: 地中的石头有蓝宝石，并有金沙。

lineList.en: There is a path which no fowl knoweth, and which the vulture's eye hath not seen:
lineList.cn: 矿中的路鸷鸟不得知道，鹰眼也未见过。

lineList.en: The lion's whelps have not trodden it, nor the fierce lion passed by it.
lineList.cn: 狂傲的野兽未曾行过。猛烈的狮子也未曾经过。

lineList.en: He putteth forth his hand upon the rock; he overturneth the mountains by the roots.
lineList.cn: 人伸手凿开坚石，倾倒山根。

lineList.en: He cutteth out rivers among the rocks; and his eye seeth every precious thing.
lineList.cn: 在磐石中凿出水道，亲眼看见各样宝物。

lineList.en: He bindeth the floods from overflowing; and the thing that is hid bringeth he forth to light.
lineList.cn: 他封闭水不得滴流，使隐藏的物显露出来。

lineList.en: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?
lineList.cn: 然而，智慧有何处可寻。聪明之处在那里呢。

lineList.en: Man knoweth not the price thereof; neither is it found in the land of the living.
lineList.cn: 智慧的价值无人能知，在活人之地也无处可寻。

lineList.en: The depth saith, It is not in me: and the sea saith, It is not with me.
lineList.cn: 深渊说，不在我内。沧海说，不在我中。

lineList.en: It cannot be gotten for gold, neither shall silver be weighed for the price thereof.
lineList.cn: 智慧非用黄金可得，也不能平白银为它的价值。

lineList.en: It cannot be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the precious onyx, or the sapphire.
lineList.cn: 俄斐金，和贵重的红玛瑙，并蓝宝石，不足与较量。

lineList.en: The gold and the crystal cannot equal it: and the exchange of it shall not be for jewels of fine gold.
lineList.cn: 黄金，和玻璃，不足与比较。精金的器皿，不足与兑换。

lineList.en: No mention shall be made of coral, or of pearls: for the price of wisdom is above rubies.
lineList.cn: 珊瑚，水晶都不足论。智慧的价值胜过珍珠（或作红宝石）。

lineList.en: The topaz of Ethiopia shall not equal it, neither shall it be valued with pure gold.
lineList.cn: 古实的红璧玺，不足与比较。精金，也不足与较量。

lineList.en: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where is the place of understanding?
lineList.cn: 智慧从何处来呢。聪明之处在那里呢。

lineList.en: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living, and kept close from the fowls of the air.
lineList.cn: 是向一切有生命的眼目隐藏，向空中的飞鸟掩蔽。

lineList.en: Destruction and death say, We have heard the fame thereof with our ears.
lineList.cn: 灭没和死亡说，我们风闻其名。

lineList.en: God understandeth the way thereof, and he knoweth the place thereof.
lineList.cn: 神明白智慧的道路，晓得智慧的所在。

lineList.en: For he looketh to the ends of the earth, and seeth under the whole heaven;
lineList.cn: 因他鉴察直到地极，遍观普天之下。

lineList.en: To make the weight for the winds; and he weigheth the waters by measure.
lineList.cn: 要为风定轻重，又度量诸水。

lineList.en: When he made a decree for the rain, and a way for the lightning of the thunder:
lineList.cn: 他为雨露定命令，为雷电定道路。

lineList.en: Then did he see it, and declare it; he prepared it, yea, and searched it out.
lineList.cn: 那时他看见智慧，而且述说。他坚定，并且查究。

lineList.en: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the LORD, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
lineList.cn: 他对人说，敬畏主就是智慧。远离恶便是聪明。
